Class DataFrame

  • java.lang.Object
    • pckg.DataFrame
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SparseDataFrame
    public class DataFrame
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      DataFrame()
      Constructor for DataFrame Class creates object with empty dataBase Map
      DataFrame​(java.lang.String[] typesInput, java.lang.String[] colsInput)
      Constructor for DataFrame Class adds column types and names to types and cols Lists creates new ArrayLists and puts them to dataBase Map
      DataFrame​(java.lang.String address, java.lang.String[] typesInput)
      Constructor for DataFrame Class Fills cols List with column names given in first line of the file Fills columns with data from file
      DataFrame​(java.lang.String address, java.lang.String[] typesInput, java.lang.String[] colsInput)
      Costructor for DataFrame Class Fills columns with data from file

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addElement​(java.lang.Object[] input)
      Adds row to DataFrame object (adds element to every ArrayList in dataBase Map) Checks whether number of given arguments is compatible to number of columns Checks whether types of given arguments are compatible with type of each column If type of argument is not a primitive type, checks whether its users type Checks for ClassNotFoundException
      java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> get​(java.lang.String colname)
      Returns contents of a column indicated by its name
      DataFrame get​(java.lang.String[] colls, boolean copy)
      Creates copy of indicated columns from DataFrame object Depending on copy boolean, creates deep or shallow copy
      DataFrame iloc​(int i)
      Creates new DataFrame object storing only one indicated row
      DataFrame iloc​(int from, int to)
      Creates new DataFrame object Stores only indicated rows ranging from Integer from to Integer to
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a String representation of DataFrame object

      • DataFrame

        public DataFrame​(java.lang.String[] typesInput,
                 java.lang.String[] colsInput)
        Constructor for DataFrame Class adds column types and names to types and cols Lists creates new ArrayLists and puts them to dataBase Map
        Parameters:
        typesInput - String Array of types that each column will keep
        colsInput - String Array of names of columns

      • DataFrame

        public DataFrame​(java.lang.String address,
                 java.lang.String[] typesInput)
          throws java.io.IOException
        Constructor for DataFrame Class Fills cols List with column names given in first line of the file Fills columns with data from file
        Parameters:
        address - String containing file's address
        typesInput - String Array of types that each column will keep
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

    • Method Detail

      • get

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Object> get​(java.lang.String colname)
        Returns contents of a column indicated by its name
        Parameters:
        colname - String with name of the column
        Returns:
        contents of indicated column

      • get

        public DataFrame get​(java.lang.String[] colls,
                     boolean copy)
        Creates copy of indicated columns from DataFrame object Depending on copy boolean, creates deep or shallow copy
        Parameters:
        colls - String Array with names of the columns to copy
        copy - boolean, where: true gives deep copy, false gives shallow copy
        Returns:
        DataFrame object with copied columns

      • iloc

        public DataFrame iloc​(int i)
        Creates new DataFrame object storing only one indicated row
        Parameters:
        i - number of row to copy
        Returns:
        DataFrame object

      • iloc

        public DataFrame iloc​(int from,
                      int to)
        Creates new DataFrame object Stores only indicated rows ranging from Integer from to Integer to
        Parameters:
        from - number of first row
        to - number of last row
        Returns:
        DataFrame object with only indicated rows

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a String representation of DataFrame object
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        a String representation of DataFrame object

      • addElement

        public void addElement​(java.lang.Object[] input)
        Adds row to DataFrame object (adds element to every ArrayList in dataBase Map) Checks whether number of given arguments is compatible to number of columns Checks whether types of given arguments are compatible with type of each column If type of argument is not a primitive type, checks whether its users type Checks for ClassNotFoundException
        Parameters:
        input - Array of Objects to put in columns
